ResearchProjectDef.label: Stellar Pollution Pump
ResearchProjectDef.description: Our perfect technologies cannot thrive in imperfect universe. We have to cleanse the mechanoid filth from the soil surrounding us.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cosmic Pollution Pump
ResearchProjectDef.description: Our growing proficiency with the more advanced materials make it easier for us to effectively clean the planet.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Enigmatic Pollution Pump
ResearchProjectDef.description: With Eternium at our disposal cleansing the earth is fast and furiously efficient.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic stellar mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control basic-tier mechanoids with stellar technology.

ResearchProjectDef.label: standard stellar mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control standard-tier mechanoids with stellar technology.\n\nYou can get signal chips by using a mechanitor to summon a diabolus threat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: high stellar mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control high-tier mechanoids with stellar technology.\n\nYou can get powerfocus chips by using a mechanitor to summon a war queen threat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ultra stellar mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The advanced technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control ultra-tier mechanoids with stellar technology, including large mechs and ultra-tier mechanitor gear.\n\nYou can get nano structuring chips by using a mechanitor to summon an apocriton threat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic cosmic mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control basic-tier mechanoids with cosmic technology.

ResearchProjectDef.label: standard cosmic mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control standard-tier mechanoids with cosmic technology.\n\nYou can get signal chips by using a mechanitor to summon a diabolus threat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: high cosmic mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control high-tier mechanoids with cosmic technology.\n\nYou can get powerfocus chips by using a mechanitor to summon a war queen threat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ultra cosmic mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The advanced technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control ultra-tier mechanoids with cosmic technology, including large mechs and ultra-tier mechanitor gear.\n\nYou can get nano structuring chips by using a mechanitor to summon an apocriton threat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic enigmatic mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control basic-tier mechanoids with enigmatic technology.

ResearchProjectDef.label: standard enigmatic mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control standard-tier mechanoids with enigmatic technology.\n\nYou can get signal chips by using a mechanitor to summon a diabolus threat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: high enigmatic mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control high-tier mechanoids with enigmatic technology.\n\nYou can get powerfocus chips by using a mechanitor to summon a war queen threat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ultra enigmatic mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The advanced technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control ultra-tier mechanoids with enigmatic technology, including large mechs and ultra-tier mechanitor gear.\n\nYou can get nano structuring chips by using a mechanitor to summon an apocriton threat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wasteful Tier 1 Refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Devise alternative processing methods that are twice as fast, but will in turn produce a lot of waste.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wasteful Tier II refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Devise new processing methods, producing a lot of waste in exchange for speed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wasteful Tier III Refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Devise new refining methods that produce twice as fast but produce a lot of waste.
